com.petpet.c3po.dao.mongo
Interface MongoModelSerializer

All Known Implementing Classes:
MongoActionLogSerializer, MongoElementSerializer, MongoPropertySerializer, MongoSourceSerializer
public interface MongoModelSerializer

A simple interface for serializing objects into Mongo DBObjects.

Author:
Petar Petrov

Method Summary
 com.mongodb.DBObject serialize(Object object)
          Serializes the given object to a DBObject.
 

Method Detail

serialize

com.mongodb.DBObject serialize(Object object)
Serializes the given object to a DBObject. It is up to the backend provider how the POJO will be mapped into the mongo schema.

Parameters:
object - the object to serialize.
Returns:
the serialized DBObject
